title: Stocks Steady as Treasury Yields Slip After CPI | Closing Bell
description: Comprehensive cross-platform coverage of the U.S. market close on Bloomberg Television, Bloomberg Radio, and YouTube with Katie Greifeld, Bailey Lipschultz, Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. (Source: Bloomberg)
